attributes.additional_details: Mortgage Companies are taking advantage of owners by increasing costs and charges and accelerating repossesions and profiteering from hardship - Should this not be fully investigated - Kensington Mortgage Comapny were fined 1.25 Million pounds by the FSA but who were the Directors at the time when all of this worry sorrow and stress were being inflicted on house owners being evicted ? Was  this one 21 Nov 2007 – Lloyds TSB today announced the appointment of John Maltby as Managing Director of Lloyds TSB Commercial - Is this not incredible ?
